sourcesContent:
import {Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-bar', templateUrl: './side-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-bar.component.scss'] }) export class SideBarComponent { @Input() items: any[] | undefined; @Output() dataSideBarChanged: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter() public sidebarStatus: boolean = true; changeStatusSideBar() { this.sidebarStatus = !this.sidebarStatus this.dataSideBarChanged.emit(!this.sidebarStatus) } }
